user.title: Saxo Portfolio Setup
user.description: Set up your Saxo Portfolio integration to monitor your investment portfolio in Home Assistant.

auth.title: Authorize with Saxo Bank
auth.description: Click the link below to authorize Home Assistant to access your Saxo Bank portfolio data.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Saxo Bank. Please check your internet connection.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: Saxo Portfolio is already configured for this account.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Saxo Portfolio is allowed.

init.title: Saxo Portfolio Options
init.description: Configure options for your Saxo Portfolio integration.

deprecated_yaml.title: YAML configuration is deprecated
deprecated_yaml.description: Configuring Saxo Portfolio using YAML is deprecated. Please remove the YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and set up the integration using the UI.

refresh_data.name: Refresh Portfolio Data
refresh_data.description: Manually refresh portfolio data from Saxo Bank API.
